nodes.text: Crimson Talon was an area of space in the Karthakk system. The Blood Razors inhabited the Crimson Talon territory, only venturing out from their outpost to sabotage the expansion efforts by the Kimogilia Fanatics. The war between these two pirate factions presented much danger to those wishing to travel through the area. Pitched on either side of the Spine of Lok, the Kimogila Fanatics and the Blood Razors often met in the middle to engage in a dogfight.
